# 1878 Chicago White Stockings season

| league_place = 4th
| owner = William Hulbert
| manager = Bob Ferguson
| television =
| radio =
|}}
The 1878 Chicago White Stockings season was the seventh season of the Chicago White Stockings franchise, the third in the National League and the first at Lakefront Park. The White Stockings finished fourth in the National League with a record of 30â€“30.
